title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 337.12 - Charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 337.12 - Charges

State Regulations

When an employee is on sick leave, the employee shall not
be required to charge sick leave credit for any day upon which the employee
would not have been required to be available to work had the employee not been
on sick leave. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
337.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
